Texts.Eng:
Do not feed them whole grain, their stomachs can't dissolve their protective coating. 

Diet: ^orange;Carnivore^reset;

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  +^green;20^reset;% Max Food
  Health x^green;1.1^reset;
  Energy x^green;1.1^reset;
  Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;
  Resist: ^green;50^reset;% Ice, ^green;20^reset;% Poison
 
^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  In cold biomes:
    Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;20^reset;% Speed & Jump. +^green;15^reset;% Physical Resist.
  In hot biomes:
    Health x^red;0.9^reset;, -^red;20^reset;% speed & jump and -^red;40^reset;% Energy Regeneration.
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
  Magnorbs: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Spears: +^green;7^reset;% Damage
  Dual Shortspears: +^green;20^reset;% Crit Damage, +^green;10^reset;% Jump
  Dagger: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Poor reputation: -^red;15^reset;% Charisma
  Defense x^red;0.85^reset;
  Resist: -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;25^reset;% Fire, Electric
